QuestData.Title: Nana's Vote I: Nana's Secret Recipe
QuestData.Description: The next vote we'll need is from Nana Mudclaw. She's Haohan's grandmother, and she's been a Tiller longer than you and I have been alive!$B$BShe's still working at the Tillers building in Halfhill. Why don't you pay her a visit?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Nana Mudclaw at Halfhill in the Valley of the Four Winds.
